Query.intro: Hi. I'm Ally from QA_AUTOMATION. I will help you find jobs instantly. To continue, reply Y for Yes.
Query.y_zipCode: Understood. What zipcode would you like to work in?
Query.y_availableJobs: Got it! Here are the job(s) that I have available:
Query.y_legallyAllowed: Alright. Are you legally allowed to work in the United States? Reply with Y or N
Query.y_ageVerification: Thanks! Are you 18 years of age or older? Reply with Y or N
Query.y_jobType: Okay. Would you be interested in a Part-time or Full-time role? Reply with PT, FT or Either
Query.y_ServSafeCertification: Got it! Do you have a ServSafe certification? Reply with Y or N
Query.y_NBAGames: Okay. How many quarters in a NBA game?
Query.y_YearsOFExperience: Okay. How many years of relevant experience do you have? Reply with None or 1, 2+
Query.y_RetailExperience: Got it! How many years of retail experience do you have? Reply with None or 1-2, 3+
Query: Unfortunately Role2 at QA_AUTOMATION requires one to have at least 2+ yrs of experience. Would you be interested in looking for other roles? (Y/N)
Query.n_ThanksForYourInterest: Got it. Thanks for your interest. We will stay in touch.
